# Boomathon

> The ultimate arena of tough teamship.

Boomathon is a high-stakes virtual team challenge developed by Jenson8 Ltd. It measures and develops six core teamship skills: leadership, collaboration, emotional intelligence, communication, conflict resolution, and adaptability.

## What is Boomathon?

Boomathon is a mentally demanding relay experience where teams hand off across time zones to regenerate a dying planet. It blends the camaraderie of mountain climbers with the strategy of extreme athletes, channelled into forging unbreakable corporate teams.

## Key Facts

- Participants: 12 to 1,000 per event
- Time zones: 1 to 24 (global relay format)
- Duration: 2 to 24 hours
- 6 core skills measured: Leadership, Collaboration, Emotional Intelligence, Communication, Conflict Resolution, Adaptability
- Target audience: Corporate teams, executives, enterprise organisations

## Contact

- Email: jena@jenson8.com
- Website: https://boomathon.netlify.app
- Parent company: Jenson8 Ltd
